name: Quidditch Evolution
description:
Quidditch Evolution is a football-like game set in a futuristic neon scene on the Moon.  This game was made by Bugn't, a group of four 1rst year students from EPITA for their 1rst year project. 

Made in 4 months from scratch. Huge thanks to their Bugn't Team for the great work !

Default Controls :

- Move : ZQSD

- Jump : Space

- Camera Orientation : Mouse

- Catch Ball : Left Click

- Shoot : Right Click

- Spells : AE

- Powerups : Alphas 1, 2 and 3

Tools : Unity, Blender.
